name: Make one meal
text: Don't get into the habit of cooking for a variety of likes and dislikes and make one meal for everyone.

name: Plan everything
text: Plan and make use of shopping lists in order to avoid temptation in the supermarket.

name: Buy seasonal
text: Buy food with lower prices when it's seasonal, specially when it comes to fruit and veg.

name: Use leftovers
text: Leftover bread? Freeze it and use it up another day as breadcrumbs or chunky baked croutons.

name: Upgrade your outfits
text: Add to your wardrobe inexpensive accessories that you can mix with your outfits.

name: Store clothes properly
text: Extend the life of the clothes you do have by taking care when you store them.

name: Fix clothes by yourself
text: Fix your clothes instead of getting rid or giving them to charity and buying new ones.

name: Hunt for deals
text: Sign up to the newsletters of big departaments stores and keep track of their major sales.

name: Use LED bulbs
text: Use energy-efficient LED bulbs to cut down on electricity costs in the long term.

name: Full load laundry
text: Pack your washer to capacity and run full loads of laundry in order to save on water.

name: Lower heater temperature
text: Lower the temperature on your heater and dress accordingly to the temperature.

name: Hang-dry your clothes
text: Save energy with your laundry by hang-drying your clothes.

name: Library free resources
text: Use library free online resources, such as ebooks or even streaming services.

name: Keep track on offers
text: Check out specials, daily deals, discounts, and coupons offered online.

name: Visit movie matinees
text: Go to movie matinees, since most movie theaters charge less for tickets for afternoon showings.

name: Alternative sport events
text: Attend low-cost or free sporting events hosted by many high schools and colleges.

name: Buy regular fuel
text: Dont pay extra for premium fuel and buy the regular version, which is cheaper.

name: Control your speed
text: Avoid high speeds when unnecessary in order to save you money with better fuel economy.

name: Mantain car tires
text: Keep your tires properly pressurized to get the most out of your gas tank.

name: Turn off engine when possible
text: Turn off your car engine if you are going to need to idle for more than 10 seconds.

name: Benefit from happy hours
text: Hit up happy hour: grab dinner on the early side and eat half-priced appetizers as your entr√©e.

name: Don't waste food
text: Before your food arrives, ask for a to-go box and stash half of it in the box to enjoy later.

name: Use discount coupons
text: Create an email address just for coupons and sign up for email alerts from your favorite restaurants.

name: Take your meal home
text: Instead of dining in, get your food to go and tip the takeout person around 5% rather than 10%.
